paragraphs.title: Generate Data, create Dataframe, and register View
paragraphs.text:
%r 

schema <- structType(
            structField("productName", "string"), 
            structField("price", "float"),
            structField("sku", "float")
            )

productList = list(
       list("Tooth Paste", 2.99, 1234),
       list("Milk", 4.59, 4567),
       list("Oatmeal", 3.65, 8910)
        )

df <- as.DataFrame(productList, schema=schema) 

head(df)

createOrReplaceTempView(df, "product")

msg.data:
productName price  sku
1 Tooth Paste  2.99 1234
2        Milk  4.59 4567
3     Oatmeal  3.65 8910
